text: Yesli vy obe pokayetes' pered Allakhom, to ved' vashi serdtsa uzhe uklonilis' v storonu. Yesli zhe vy stanete podderzhivat' drug druga protiv nego, to ved' yemu pokrovitel'stvuyet Allakh, a Dzhibril (Gavriil) i pravednyye veruyushchiye yavlyayutsya yego druz'yami. A, krome togo, angely pomogayut yemu
